name: Heroes of Might and Magic V Map
summary: An H5M file is a game map used by Heroes of Might and Magic V, a popular turn-based strategy game. Each H5M file is a renamed .ZIP file, which contains all the files needed to load a game map. Players can create H5M files with Heroes of Might and Magic V's Map Editor, added in version 1.3.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .h5m to .zip ; decompress with any Zip-decompression utility
Ubisoft Heroes of Might and Magic V
